# URL escaped characters
\%[0-9A-F]{2}
# GitHub SHAs
/github\.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/[0-9a-f]+\b
# sha-1
"[0-9a-f]{40}"
# sha-256
SHA256="[0-9a-f]{64}"
"sha256": "[0-9a-f]{64}"
# uuid:
[>{"'][0-9a-fA-F]{8}-(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-){3}[0-9a-fA-F]{12}['"}<]
# hex digits including css/html color classes:
(?:[\\0][xX]|[uU]\+|#|\&H)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR]{2,}[uU]?[lL]{0,2}\b
# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\1{3,}\b
